meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a clown in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her clownishness at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: His clownishness in the circus delighted the audience.
meanings.sent3: The clownishness of the situation lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: His outfit added a touch of clownishness to the event.
meanings.sent5: The child's clownishness was contagious and spread joy.

meanings.definition: The act or behavior of a clown.
meanings.sent1: The clown's clownishness entertained the children at the birthday party.
meanings.sent2: Watching the clown's clownishness brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated clownishness made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The clown's clownishness was a hit at the circus.
meanings.sent5: The clown's clownishness was truly a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being silly or foolish in a humorous way.
meanings.sent1: His friends enjoyed his clownishness during the comedy show.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's clownishness was the highlight of the performance.
meanings.sent3: She added a touch of clownishness to her jokes to make them funnier.
meanings.sent4: The group's clownishness brought joy to the party.
meanings.sent5: The clownishness of the situation made everyone chuckle.
